snippet.title: Bugvasion TD Announcement Trailer - Full Screen Games - Try the demo now on Steam!
snippet.description:
Steam store page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1337000/Bugvasion_TD/

Bugvasion TD is a classic tower defense strategy game where you have to stop alien possessed bugs from attacking your home. Use your homemade arsenal of weapons to repell the invaders. With quirky and engaging visuals, a variety of different towers and special abilities. Bugvasion TD aims to give the players several hours of casual fun and an interesting story to follow.

Developer: Full Screen Games
Planned Release Date: 17th of February, 2021
Platforms: PC
Website: www.fullscreengames.net
Availability: Digital Download
Languages: English, French, Hungarian
ESRB: E for everyone
File Size: 1500 MB PC Installer
Press Contact: fullscreengamesstudio@gmail.com

Features:
- Classic tower defense game with a quirky theme and engaging visuals
- 20 + unique levels
- Plenty of different enemy types with their own unique features
- A variety of upgradeable towers 
- A ton of unlockable special attacks and abilities
- Story mode
- Steam achievements
- And there is heaps more!
